printed_text: [trash]: The Corp cannot rez more than 1 piece of ice for the remainder of this run. Use this ability only during a run.
stripped_printed_text: trash: The Corp cannot rez more than 1 piece of ice for the remainder of this run. Use this ability only during a run.

printed_text:
When you install this program, choose a server. As an additional cost to install a card in the root of or protecting that server, the Corp must pay 1[credit].
When the Corp purges virus counters, trash this program.
stripped_printed_text: When you install this program, choose a server. As an additional cost to install a card in the root of or protecting that server, the Corp must pay 1 credit. When the Corp purges virus counters, trash this program.

attribution: Designed by 2013 World Champion Jens Erickson
printed_text: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, the Corp adds all cards in HQ to the top of R&D in the order of their choice.
stripped_printed_text: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, the Corp adds all cards in HQ to the top of R&D in the order of their choice.

flavor: "Why would you dispose of perfectly good evidence when you can sell it?"
printed_text: Whenever you use a [trash] ability, gain 1[credit].
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you use a trash ability, gain 1 credit.

printed_text:
NetChip can host a program with a memory cost less than or equal to the number of copies of NetChip installed. The memory cost of the hosted program does not count against your memory limit.
Limit 6 per deck.
stripped_printed_text: NetChip can host a program with a memory cost less than or equal to the number of copies of NetChip installed. The memory cost of the hosted program does not count against your memory limit. Limit 6 per deck.

flavor: "We may be outraged, but we're not surprised." -Sunder
printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The Corp has 1 additional bad publicity (even if they have 0).
stripped_printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The Corp has 1 additional bad publicity (even if they have 0).

flavor: "The corporations may be stronger than any of us, but they are not stronger than all of us." -Akshara Sareen
printed_text: Play only if you have a seedy card installed. The Corp gets -1 allotted [click] for their next turn.
stripped_printed_text: Play only if you have a seedy card installed. The Corp gets -1 allotted click for their next turn.

printed_text:
When you rez Advanced Assembly Lines, gain 3[credit].
[trash]: Install a non-agenda card from HQ (paying the install cost). You cannot use this ability during a run.
stripped_printed_text: When you rez Advanced Assembly Lines, gain 3 credits. trash: Install a non-agenda card from HQ (paying the install cost). You cannot use this ability during a run.

printed_text: Whenever you rez a card, place 1 power counter on Lakshmi Smartfabrics. X hosted power counters: Reveal an agenda worth X points from HQ. The Runner cannot steal copies of that agenda for the remainder of this turn.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you rez a card, place 1 power counter on Lakshmi Smartfabrics. X hosted power counters: Reveal an agenda worth X points from HQ. The Runner cannot steal copies of that agenda for the remainder of this turn.

printed_text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance [haas-bioroid] cards in your deck. Trash a rezzed asset or upgrade. If you do, gain credits equal to its trash cost.
stripped_printed_text: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliancehaas-bioroid cards in your deck. Trash a rezzed asset or upgrade. If you do, gain credits equal to its trash cost.

printed_text: The first time each turn the Runner draws a card, gain 1[credit].
stripped_printed_text: The first time each turn the Runner draws a card, gain 1 credit.

flavor: Expensive to build but dramatically more efficient than traditional farming, agroplexes are emblems of the inevitable corporatization of the food industry.
printed_text: When your turn begins, each player draws 1 card.
stripped_printed_text: When your turn begins, each player draws 1 card.

flavor: "We can help others, yet also help ourselves." -Soraiya Suresh, VP Public Programs
printed_text:
[subroutine] The Runner draws 3 cards and then discards down to their maximum hand size.
[subroutine] The Runner draws 3 cards and then discards down to their maximum hand size.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine The Runner draws 3 cards and then discards down to their maximum hand size. Subroutine The Runner draws 3 cards and then discards down to their maximum hand size.

flavor: Data, not food, is one of the biggest exports from the Gujarat district of Mumbad.
printed_text: Your maximum hand size is increased by 2.
stripped_printed_text: Your maximum hand size is increased by 2.

printed_text:
While the Runner is accessing this upgrade in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this upgrade, you may add any number of cards from HQ to the bottom of R&D.
stripped_printed_text: While the Runner is accessing this upgrade in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this upgrade, you may add any number of cards from HQ to the bottom of R&D.

printed_text: Install only faceup. (This agenda is neither rezzed nor unrezzed.) Whenever you advance this agenda, you may install 1 card from HQ in the root of a new server. If there are 5 or more hosted advancement counters, rez that card, ignoring all costs.
stripped_printed_text: Install only faceup. (This agenda is neither rezzed nor unrezzed.) Whenever you advance this agenda, you may install 1 card from HQ in the root of a new server. If there are 5 or more hosted advancement counters, rez that card, ignoring all costs.

printed_text:
When your turn begins, place 1 advancement token on Mumbad Construction Co.
2[credit]: Move 1 advancement token from Mumbad Construction Co. to a faceup card.
stripped_printed_text: When your turn begins, place 1 advancement token on Mumbad Construction Co. 2 credits: Move 1 advancement token from Mumbad Construction Co. to a faceup card.

flavor: "You got it. We sell it. They buy it. Everyone wins."
printed_text:
When you score Corporate Sales Team, place 10[credit] on it.
When each player's turn begins, take 1[credit] from Corporate Sales Team.
stripped_printed_text: When you score Corporate Sales Team, place 10 credits on it. When each player's turn begins, take 1 credit from Corporate Sales Team.

[click]: Place 1 advancement token on a card. You cannot score that card until your next turn begins.
